Method Detail

C

public static int C(int N,
                    int K)
Recursively takes the combination of N-take-K (made static for ease of user experience)

Parameters:
N - the possible numbers
K - the desired cardinality of subsets of N
Returns:
C(N-1, K-1) + C(N-1, K) - the number of combinations
